reviewText: Ok, I saw Peter Kay on Alan Carr who I find a scream and after looking at reviews of how fab Peter is I thort why not purchase this dvd.  For one I had to rewind a few times as his accent is strong, I am from Australia (and yes we have a VERY stong accent and we are VERY close to the Brits - but I watched it twice and did not get his humour and did not laugh once and yes maybe it is his accent. If you are british - maybe go for it! but otherwise forget it!  Not for me.
This DVD is so funny (more so if you Americans can understand what he is saying). Pure unadulterated fun.
